RegionPush.Title: Welcome to Houkai 3rd (Honkai Impact 3rd Japan) PC Client
RegionPush.Message: Hi there, We glad to announce you that Houkai 3rd is now availabe in Collapse Launcher! Hope you can enjoy to play in this new supported server.
